about_the_game:
What starts as a simple job to pay the rent pulls you into a world of secrets, relationships, and personal growth. As you clean the backyard of your landlady’s boss, you uncover hidden truths, forge connections with compelling women, and face tough choices that shape your journey.

Build trust, explore romance, and navigate intrigue in this choice-driven adult Visual Novel. Your actions determine the relationships you build, the mysteries you unravel, and the unique ending to your story. Will you rise to the challenge or let it slip away? The choice is yours.

Features:


  • High-quality graphics
  • Full Day 1
  • 6000+ Words
  • Lewd scenes
  • Scene gallery
  • Multiple playthroughs

Locked in Temptation contains graphic sexual content.


Player discretion is strongly advised.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is intended for adults only. It contains explicit images or depictions of sexual acts and violence. If any of these topics may offend you, we recommend not playing the game. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

name: Locked in Temptation - Demo
short_description: Locked in Temptation is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel. Unravel the web of intrigue that threatens everything. Romance captivating women, uncover betrayals, and embrace your transformation in this thrilling blend of drama, intrigue, and sex.
